00030 // String conversions (all python functions uses always chars)
00031 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00032 
00033 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00034         #define WX2PY(x)                (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8).data())
00035 #else
00036         #define WX2PY(x)                (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8))
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #define PY2WX(x)                        (wxString(x, wxConvUTF8))
00040 
00041 
00042 #define PYSTRING2WX(x)          (PY2WX(PyString_AsString(x)))
00043 #define WX2PYSTRING(x)          (PyString_FromString(WX2PY(x))

00076                                                 PyObject *dictionary = NULL, PyObject *func = NULL);

00081                 wxScriptFunction *newf = new wxScriptFunctionPython();

00095 class wxScriptFilePython : public wxScriptFile
00096 {
00097 public:
00098         wxScriptFilePython(const wxString &toload = wxEmptyString) {            
00099                 m_tScriptFile = wxPYTHON_SCRIPTFILE;
00100                 if (!toload.IsEmpty())
00101                         Load(toload);           
00102         }
00103 
00104         virtual bool Load(const wxString &filename);
00105 };
